name: Banjo
description:
Banjo the dog carries his home wherever he goes. Help him furnish it with the items he finds on his travels. Some items will decorate the outside of his kennel and grant him abilities.

I created this game with Jayden Murray and Sean Turner in 48 hours as part of Global Game Jam 2019. We also had help from Taylor Moulton who created the music for us.

Banjo was voted Best Game by the other participants at the University of Suffolk Global Game Jam. 

Controls:

Movement: WASD
Interact: E
Pickup/Drop Kennel: F
Enter Kennel: Q
